Title: Ex Machina
Description: A programmer interacts with a sophisticated AI, leading to unexpected consequences.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: Alex Garland
Director.Bio: Alex Garland is a British writer, filmmaker, and novelist.

Title: Blade Runner
Description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: Ridley Scott
Director.Bio: Ridley Scott is an English film director and producer.

Title: A Space Odyssey
Description: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: Stanley Kubrick
Director.Bio: Stanley Kubrick was an American film director, screenwriter, and producer.

Title: The Terminator
Description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: James Cameron
Director.Bio: James Cameron is a Canadian film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Her
Description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

Genre.Name: Romance
Genre.Description: A genre focused on the romantic relationships between characters.

Director.Name: Spike Jonze
Director.Bio: Spike Jonze is an American filmmaker, photographer, and actor.

Title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
Description: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Spielberg is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: The Wachowskis
Director.Bio: Lana Wachowski and Lilly Wachowski are American film and television directors, writers, and producers.

Title: WarGames
Description: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: John Badham
Director.Bio: John Badham is an English-born American film director and television director.

Title: Transcendence
Description: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence takes on dangerous implications when his consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: Wally Pfister
Director.Bio: Wally Pfister is an American cinematographer and film director.

Title: Ghost in the Shell
Description: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Fiction based on imagined future scientific or technological advances.

Director.Name: Mamoru Oshii
Director.Bio: Mamoru Oshii is a Japanese filmmaker, television director, and screenwriter.
